lines.text: If we're gonna meet, it might as well be now.
You tell the truth about a lie so beautifully.
I'll be dead in a minute; just wanted to say good-bye.
I've spent a lot of time trying to figure out what normal means.
I'm not ambitious, not an artist, not a poet, not a revolutionary.
Leave and you kill me. Leave and I'm dead.
You must love her tremendously... more even than one's dignity.
You already know everything... you want everything, too.
Everything you need, you'll get from her.
One would ask the question 'What is a kiss?' And the answer is merely an inquiry on the second floor as to whether the first is free
